content:
Microsoft.Build.Conversion Namespace

Definition

Contains types that Visual Studio uses to convert project files from an older version of Visual Studio.

In this Article

Classes

ProjectFileConverter

Converts a Visual Studio project file to the Visual Studio 2010 project file format.
